# Wrack (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[Mortal Hunter (PrC)|Mortal Hunter]] 3, [[Pain (Domain)|Pain]] 3 , [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One humanoid

**Duration:** 1 round/level + 3d10 minutes; see text

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 243

*With the final word of the spell, your chosen foe is wracked with such pain that it doubles over and collapses. Its face and hands blister and drip fluid, and its eyes cloud with blood, rendering it blind.*

Your touch causes your target to experience excruciating pain. For the duration of the spell, the subject falls prone and is [[Blinded|blinded]] and [[Helpless|helpless]]. Even when the spell ends, the subject is still [[Shaken|shaken]] for 3d10 minutes.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Mortal Hunter 3, Pain 3 to Level per Book of Vile Darkness.

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 4 to Level.
